faq.question: What is marketing automation and how can it benefit my Gort business?
faq.answer: Marketing automation uses software to automate repetitive marketing tasks like email campaigns, lead nurturing, and customer segmentation. For Gort businesses, this means you can engage prospects 24/7, deliver personalized experiences at scale, and typically increase conversion rates by 30-45%—all while saving your team significant time for strategic work.

faq.question: What types of marketing can be automated?
faq.answer: We can automate email campaigns, lead nurturing sequences, lead scoring, social media scheduling, customer segmentation, personalized content delivery, abandoned cart recovery, welcome emails, customer onboarding, re-engagement campaigns, event follow-ups, and comprehensive performance reporting.

faq.question: Which marketing automation platform is best for my business?
faq.answer: The ideal platform depends on your specific needs, budget, and technical requirements. We're experts in HubSpot (comprehensive all-in-one), ActiveCampaign (powerful and affordable), Marketo (enterprise-level), and Mailchimp (small business friendly). During our strategy session, we'll recommend the perfect solution for your Gort business.

faq.question: Can marketing automation integrate with our CRM?
faq.answer: Yes! CRM integration is essential for effective marketing automation. We have extensive experience integrating with Salesforce, HubSpot CRM, Pipedrive, Zoho, Microsoft Dynamics, and other major platforms. This ensures your marketing and sales teams work from unified, real-time customer data.

faq.question: How long does it take to see results from marketing automation?
faq.answer: Many clients start seeing improvements within 2-4 weeks as initial workflows launch. Significant results—like measurable increases in conversion rates and lead quality—typically appear within 2-3 months as automation matures and we implement ongoing optimizations based on performance data.

faq.question: Will automation make our marketing feel impersonal?
faq.answer: Not at all! Properly implemented automation enables greater personalization through behavioral triggers, dynamic content, and AI. We create automation that delivers relevant, timely messages to each prospect—making your marketing feel more personal and engaging, not robotic or generic.

faq.question: What does marketing automation cost?
faq.answer: Investment varies based on platform, workflow complexity, and scale. Small business automation typically starts at €1,200/month (including platform costs and management). Enterprise solutions range from €3,000-€5,000/month. We provide detailed proposals based on your specific requirements and goals.

faq.question: How do you track and report automation performance?
faq.answer: We provide comprehensive monthly reports tracking email engagement rates, conversion metrics, lead velocity, pipeline contribution, customer lifetime value, time saved, and marketing ROI. You'll see exactly how automation impacts your Gort business's growth and profitability with clear, actionable insights.
